verses.verse: Run ye to and <S%H7751>fro<s%> through the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> now, and <S%H3045>know<s%>, and <S%H1245>seek<s%> in the broad <S%H7339>places<s%> thereof, if ye can <S%H4672>find<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%>, if there <S%H3426>be<s%> any that <S%H6213>executeth<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, that <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> the <S%H530>truth<s%>; and I will <S%H5545>pardon<s%> it.
And though they <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>; surely they <S%H7650>swear<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%>.

O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, are not thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> upon the <S%H530>truth<s%>? thou hast <S%H5221>stricken<s%> them, but they have not <S%H2342>grieved<s%>; thou hast <S%H3615>consumed<s%> them, but they have <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>correction<s%>: they have made their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H2388>harder<s%> than a <S%H5553>rock<s%>; they have <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%>.

Therefore I <S%H559>said<s%>, Surely these are <S%H1800>poor<s%>; they are <S%H2973>foolish<s%>: for they <S%H3045>know<s%> not the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, nor the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of their <S%H430>God<s%>.

I will <S%H3212>get<s%> me unto the great <S%H1419>men<s%>, and will <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto them; for they have <S%H3045>known<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of their <S%H430>God<s%>: but these have <S%H3162>altogether<s%> <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%>, and <S%H5423>burst<s%> the <S%H4147>bonds<s%>.

Wherefore a <S%H738>lion<s%> out of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> shall <S%H5221>slay<s%> them, and a <S%H2061>wolf<s%> of the <S%H6160>evenings<s%> shall <S%H7703>spoil<s%> them, a <S%H5246>leopard<s%> shall <S%H8245>watch<s%> over their <S%H5892>cities<s%>: every one that goeth <S%H3318>out<s%> thence <S%H2007>shall<s%> be torn in <S%H2963>pieces<s%>: because their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> are <S%H7231>many<s%>, and their <S%H4878>backslidings<s%> are <S%H6105>increased<s%>.

¶ <S%H335>How<s%> shall I <S%H5545>pardon<s%> thee for <S%H2063>this<s%>? thy <S%H1121>children<s%> have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, and <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by them that are <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>: when I had fed them to the <S%H7650>full<s%>, they then committed <S%H5003>adultery<s%>, and assembled themselves by <S%H1413>troops<s%> in the <S%H2181>harlots'<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%>.
They were as <S%H2109>fed<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> in the <S%H7904>morning<s%>: every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H6670>neighed<s%> after his <S%H7453>neighbour's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>.
Shall I not <S%H6485>visit<s%> for these things? <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and shall not my <S%H5315>soul<s%> be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> on such a <S%H1471>nation<s%> as this?

¶ Go ye <S%H5927>up<s%> upon her <S%H8284>walls<s%>, and <S%H7843>destroy<s%>; but <S%H6213>make<s%> not a full <S%H3617>end<s%>: take <S%H5493>away<s%> her <S%H5189>battlements<s%>; for they are not the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%>.

For the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> have dealt <S%H898>very<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%> against me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

They have <S%H3584>belied<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, It is not he; neither shall <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> upon us; neither shall we <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> nor <S%H7458>famine<s%>:
And the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> shall become <S%H7307>wind<s%>, and the <S%H1696>word<s%> is not in them: thus shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> unto them.

Wherefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, Because ye <S%H1696>speak<s%> this <S%H1697>word<s%>, behold, I will <S%H5414>make<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> in thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>, and this <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> them.

Lo, I will <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> upon you from <S%H4801>far<s%>, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: it is a <S%H386>mighty<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>, it is an <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>, a <S%H1471>nation<s%> whose <S%H3956>language<s%> thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> not, neither <S%H8085>understandest<s%> what they <S%H1696>say<s%>.
Their <S%H827>quiver<s%> is as an <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H6913>sepulchre<s%>, they are all mighty <S%H1368>men<s%>.

And they shall eat <S%H398>up<s%> thine <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, and thy <S%H3899>bread<s%>, which thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> should <S%H398>eat<s%>: they shall eat <S%H398>up<s%> thy <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and thine <S%H1241>herds<s%>: they shall eat <S%H398>up<s%> thy <S%H1612>vines<s%> and thy fig <S%H8384>trees<s%>: they shall <S%H7567>impoverish<s%> thy <S%H4013>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, wherein <S%H2007>thou<s%> <S%H982>trustedst<s%>, with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.
Nevertheless in those <S%H3117>days<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, I will not <S%H6213>make<s%> a full <S%H3617>end<s%> with you.

¶ And it shall come to pass, when ye shall <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H8478%H4100>Wherefore<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> all these things unto us? then shalt thou <S%H559>answer<s%> them, Like as ye have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> in your <S%H776>land<s%>, so shall ye <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> in a <S%H776>land<s%> that is not yours.
<S%H5046>Declare<s%> this in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and <S%H8085>publish<s%> it in <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> now this, O <S%H5530>foolish<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, and without <S%H3820>understanding<s%>; which have <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> not; which have <S%H241>ears<s%>, and <S%H8085>hear<s%> not:

<S%H3372>Fear<s%> ye not me? <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: will ye not <S%H2342>tremble<s%> at my <S%H6440>presence<s%>, which have <S%H7760>placed<s%> the <S%H2344>sand<s%> for the <S%H1366>bound<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> by a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2706>decree<s%>, that it cannot <S%H5674>pass<s%> it: and though the <S%H1530>waves<s%> thereof <S%H1607>toss<s%> themselves, yet can they not <S%H3201>prevail<s%>; though they <S%H1993>roar<s%>, yet can they not pass <S%H5674>over<s%> it?
But this <S%H5971>people<s%> hath a <S%H5637>revolting<s%> and a <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>; they are <S%H5493>revolted<s%> and <S%H3212>gone<s%>.

Neither <S%H559>say<s%> they in their <S%H3824>heart<s%>, Let us now <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, that <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%>, both the <S%H3138>former<s%> and the <S%H4456>latter<s%>, in his <S%H6256>season<s%>: he <S%H8104>reserveth<s%> unto us the <S%H2708>appointed<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> of the <S%H7105>harvest<s%>.
¶ Your <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have turned <S%H5186>away<s%> these things, and your <S%H2403>sins<s%> have <S%H4513>withholden<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> things from you.

For among my <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7563>wicked<s%> men: they lay <S%H7789>wait<s%>, as he that <S%H7918>setteth<s%> <S%H3353>snares<s%>; they <S%H5324>set<s%> a <S%H4889>trap<s%>, they <S%H3920>catch<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>.

As a <S%H3619>cage<s%> is <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H5775>birds<s%>, so are their <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H4820>deceit<s%>: therefore they are become <S%H1431>great<s%>, and waxen <S%H6238>rich<s%>.

They are waxen <S%H8080>fat<s%>, they <S%H6245>shine<s%>: yea, they <S%H5674>overpass<s%> the <S%H1697>deeds<s%> of the <S%H7451>wicked<s%>: they <S%H1777>judge<s%> not the <S%H1779>cause<s%>, the cause of the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, yet they <S%H6743>prosper<s%>; and the <S%H4941>right<s%> of the <S%H34>needy<s%> do they not <S%H8199>judge<s%>.
Shall I not <S%H6485>visit<s%> for these things? <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: shall not my <S%H5315>soul<s%> be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> on such a <S%H1471>nation<s%> as this?
¶ A <S%H8047>wonderful<s%> and horrible <S%H8186>thing<s%> is <S%H1961>committed<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>;

The <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> bear <S%H7287>rule<s%> by their <S%H3027>means<s%>; and my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> to have it so: and what will ye <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H319>end<s%> thereof?
